video.title: The Hive
video.synopsis: Through the colorful animated adventures of the busy, buzzy Bee family, "The Hive" helps preschoolers explore and understand the world around them.

episodes.synopsis: Buzzbee helps deliver mail when the postman gets hurt. / The Queen pays a visit to the school. / Rubee and Buzzbee await their new sister's arrival.
episodes.title: Postman Buzzbee/A Royal Visit/Babee's Room

episodes.synopsis: Buzzbee learns a new magic trick. / A strange noise scares Buzzbee and Barnabee while they're camping. / Buzzbee learns about first aid.
episodes.title: Buzzbee the Magician/Scaredy Bee/Buzzbee to the Rescue

episodes.synopsis: Buzzbee orders too many eggs for Mamma Bee. / Barnabee has to stand in for Buzzbee on Sports Day. / Pappa Bee gets two special cakes for his birthday.
episodes.title: Computer Bee/Sporty Bee/Birthday Bee

episodes.synopsis: Jasper and Rubee tease Buzzbee about his teddy bee. / Katypillar gives Buzzbee some seeds to sow. / A rumor swirls about Miss Ladybird's departure.
episodes.title: Buzzbee's Teddy Bee/Buzzbee's Garden/Have You Heard?

episodes.synopsis: Buzzbee learns it's OK to be noisy sometimes. / Rubee is embarrassed when her classmates laugh at her. / A game of tag wears out Grandma and Grandpa.
episodes.title: Buzzbee's Lullaby/Loyal Bee/A Windy Day!

episodes.synopsis: Barnabee is upset when Buzzbee ignores him. / Buzzbee gets carried away after becoming classroom monitor. / Buzzbee must learn to share a pet.
episodes.title: Imaginary Bee/Bee in Charge/A Bee's Best Friend

episodes.synopsis: Buzzbee learns to try things before deciding he doesn't like them. / Buzzbee and Barnabee tidy up the Hive. / Buzzbee and Jasper learn to like sleep.
episodes.title: Healthy Bee/Buzzbee Cleans Up/Sleepy Bee

episodes.synopsis: Buzzbee takes Jump to school to show everyone how to look after a pet. / Buzzbee attempts to ride Debee's new scooter. / Barnabee pretends to be sick.
episodes.title: Jump Goes to School/Scooter Bee/A Droopy Antenna

episodes.synopsis: Buzzbee learns to dance to his own beat. / Buzzbee and Jasper look after Anthill Stores. / Buzzbee and Rubee take over for an ailing Mamma Bee.
episodes.title: Dancing Bee/Buzzbee Helps Out/Being Mamma Bee

episodes.synopsis: Buzzbee learns you can be useful when others least expect it. / Buzzbee and Rubee try to get Babee to talk. / Katypillar fills in as Buzzbee's sitter.
episodes.title: Useful Bee/Babee's First Word/Buzzbee's Babysitter

episodes.synopsis: Jump comes to the rescue when Teddy Bee vanishes. / Grandpa gives his xylophone to Buzzbee and Rubee. / Buzzbee makes a special effort to be punctual.
episodes.title: Teddy Bee Lost/Musical Bees/Bee on Time

episodes.synopsis: Debee gets the giggles. / Rubee and Debee need help settling their differences. / Buzzbee and Barnabee look for treasure using a metal detector.
episodes.title: Giggly Bee/How to Be Friends/Buzzbee Digs for Treasure

episodes.synopsis: Buzzbee conquers his fear of the unknown. / Buzzbee tries to determine who's in an old photo. / Buzzbee and Jasper learn a lesson when they swap toys.
episodes.title: Brave Bee/Buzzbee's Mystery Photo/Buzzbee Makes a Swap

episodes.synopsis: Buzzbee finds himself torn between two commitments. / Buzzbee directs his very own documentary. / Buzzbee discovers the benefits of being tidy.
episodes.title: The Other Buzzbee/Buzzbee's Big Film/Buzzbee's Den

episodes.synopsis: A bedtime story captures the imagination of the entire hive. / Buzzbee accidentally creates confusion between his friends. / Buzzbee gets a tummyache.
episodes.title: Once Upon a Buzzbee/Bees in Space/Don't Be Greedy

episodes.synopsis: Buzzbee and Barnabee learn that organization helps. / Katypillar suddenly has green feet. / Buzzbee wants Mamma to have the best Mother's Day ever.
episodes.title: Organised Bee/It's Not Easy Being Green/Mother's Day

episodes.synopsis: Lord Bartlebee loosens up. / Pappa discovers that a good deed can be as good as exercise! / Buzzbee and Rubee learn to appreciate each other.
episodes.title: Funny Bee/Pappa Gets Fit/Buzzbee Buzzes Off

episodes.synopsis: Jasper's joke goes too far. / Buzzbee can't think of anything to bring for show-and-tell. / Buzzbee's record attempt takes a dramatic turn.
episodes.title: Silly Bee/Show and Tell Bee/Winning Isn't Everything

episodes.synopsis: The class goes on a surprise treasure hunt. / Jump has a new squeaky toy bone. / Buzzbee learns that sometimes it's important to keep a secret.
episodes.title: Treasure Hunt/Squeaky Bee/Buzzbee's Secrets

episodes.synopsis: Teddy Bee is missing! / Miss Ladybird is away for the day. / Buzzbee and Barnabee discover that it's always best to own up to your mistakes.
episodes.title: Lord Bartlebee and the Teddy Bee/Miss Ladybird's Day Off/Rainy Day Fun

episodes.synopsis: Millisant receives an anniversary present. / Buzzbee wants to be a collector but has no idea what to collect. / Buzzbee learns about good manners.
episodes.title: Do the Sticky Stomp!/Collector Bee/Polite Bee

episodes.synopsis: Hive residents come together to try to make it rain. / The Bee family goes to the seaside. / Katypillar tries to revive a plant in time for spring.
episodes.title: Raindance/Buzzbee's Holiday/Spring Bee

episodes.synopsis: Jasper tells a monster story. / Who will have the honor of turning on the lights at the festival? / Lord Bartlebee shows how to overcome fears.
episodes.title: Jasper's Monster/Festival of Light/Lord Bartlebee and the Thunderstorm

episodes.synopsis: Buzzbee helps Mr. Millipede overcome stage fright. / Buzzbee and Jasper restore a toy. / Barnabee learns his friends organized a picnic without him.
episodes.title: Peek-a-Bee/Buzzbee's New Ball/Lonely Bee

episodes.synopsis: Buzzbee learns that sometimes change is good. / Buzzbee and Jasper blame their mischief on Babee. / Buzzbee helps Grandma during her driving lesson.
episodes.title: Buzzbee's Goodbye/Babee's Busy Day/Grandma Bee Learns to Drive

episodes.synopsis: Buzzbee feels forgotten as everyone fusses over Babee. / Buzzbee gets festive! / A surprise at Ant Hill cheers up Buzbee's winter blues.
episodes.title: Babee's First Christmas/The Night Before Christmas/Buzzbee and the Snowbee
